pma:database.name: calendator
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `task` ( `linkid` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `title` int(11) NOT NULL, `est_hours` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`est_hours`)), `est_startdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `est_enddate` date DEFAULT NULL, `actual_startdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `actual_enddate` date DEFAULT NULL, `gantt` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`gantt`)), `progress` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`progress`)), `timesheet` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`timesheet`)), `actual_hours` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `x_1` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_1`)), `x_2` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_2`)), PRIMARY KEY (`linkid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
